metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8647 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: An input validation vulnerability was found in Ansible's mysql_user modulebefore 2.2.1.0, which may fail to correctly change a password in certaincircumstances. Thus the previous password would still be active when itshould have been changed.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
